Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hsenid.assignment1.Student

  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    Blueprint of the student object managed in the system.

      • getTot

        public float getTot()
        Retrieve the total marks of the relevant instance.
        Returns:
        the total mark as a float value.

      • setTot

        public void setTot()
        Sets the total value for the instance. Iterates through the Student.sub_marks instance and sums up the marks. All the mark entries in the map with a value less than zero will be ignored.

      • getAvg

        public float getAvg()
        Gets the average
        Returns:
        the current value of the Student.avg.

      • setAvg

        public void setAvg()
        Sets the average mark of the student based on the total. Here, the absent subjects are ignored.

      • getGrade

        public java.lang.String getGrade()
        Gets the current grade of the student.
        Returns:
        returns the present grade ranging in A,B,C,S,F.

      • showReport

        public void showReport(Subjects sb)
        Generates the report of performance for each student that contains marks for each subject, total and average.
        Parameters:

      • sort

        public static void sort(Student[] arr,
                        char cr)
        Sorts an array containing Student objects based on either grade, or by name.
        Parameters:
        arr - array object needs to be sorted
        cr - criteria that should be sorted on(n = name && g = grade)

      • sort

        public static void sort(Student[] arr,
                        java.lang.Integer i)
        Sorts a given array of com.hsenid.assignment1.Student based on the marks for a particular subject, on the ascending order.
        Parameters:
        arr - array that needs to be sorted.
        i - index of the subject in the subjects array as a java.lang.Integer object.
